name: Rush Hour (itch) (Red Basement Productions)
description:
Rush Hour is a game about loosing and finding your fellow ant.

How to play:

Controls:
Player 1: WASD
Player 2: Arrow keys

Coop-Mode:
The challenge for player 1 on the left side is to follow the blue line to the red goal hole. Their should also make sure to remember the way so their can give advice for player 2. Player 1 starts after the counter is finished. Player 2 has to wait a bit longer until the counter is finished. After that player 2 should try to follow the way of player 1 to find the same red goal hole as player 2. When you both end up in the same hole, the game is won.

Singleplayer-Mode:
In this mode an AI-ant will be spawned in the left screen as soon as the counter is finished. It will then immediately walk to its goal. You as the player have to try to remember the way the AI-ant went, so you can follow it until you both are in the same red goal hole.

Hints:
In every level are more than one red goal hole, but only one is the right one.
Puddles will make you slower.
The game is lost as soon as one player is outside the screen.

Credits:
Made by Jonathan Krönke and Magnus Drebenstedt as part of the Global Game Jam 2021 in Bayreuth.
